meanings.sent1: The jacket is nonwool and keeps me warm.
meanings.sent2: I prefer nonwool blankets because they are hypoallergenic.
meanings.sent3: The sheep wore a nonwool coat to blend in with the others.
meanings.sent4: Her nonwool scarf felt like a gentle hug around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The nonwool fabric was as soft as a cloud against her skin.

meanings.definition: A material that is not wool.
meanings.sent1: She chose a nonwool for her sweater to avoid itching.
meanings.sent2: The store offers a variety of nonwools for knitting enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The nonwool was mistaken for wool by the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: His nonwool gloves provided excellent insulation in the cold.
meanings.sent5: The nonwool felt smooth and sleek to the touch.

meanings.definition: To describe something that is not wool.
meanings.sent1: I will nonwool the fabric to ensure it is suitable for the project.
meanings.sent2: She nonwooled the yarn to check for any imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The tailor nonwooled the material before starting the design.
meanings.sent4: He nonwools all his products to cater to customers with allergies.
meanings.sent5: Nonwooling the thread revealed its true quality and texture.
